findings.description:
Reentrancy in KingOfEther.claimThrone() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#8-16):
	External calls:
	- (sent,None) = king.call{value: balance}() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#11)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance = msg.value (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#14)
	KingOfEther.balance (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#6) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- KingOfEther.balance (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#6)
	- KingOfEther.claimThrone() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#8-16)
	- king = msg.sender (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#15)
	KingOfEther.king (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#5) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- KingOfEther.claimThrone() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#8-16)
	- KingOfEther.king (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_009.sol#5)
